verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H3389"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w her|strong="H3045"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: Thy root, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* thy nativity \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Chanaan, thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w an|strong="H0559"\w* Amorrhite, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w a|strong="H0776"\w* Cethite.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* thou wast \w born|strong="H3205"\w*, \w in|strong="H7364"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* thy nativity thy \w navel|strong="H8270"\w* wits \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* wast thou \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w for|strong="H4325"\w* thy health, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* salted \w with|strong="H3117"\w* salt, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* swaddled \w with|strong="H3117"\w* clouts.

\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* \w had|strong="H3205"\w* \w pity|strong="H2347"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w compassion|strong="H2550"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* thou wast \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* earth \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* abjection \w of|strong="H3117"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* thou wast \w born|strong="H3205"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7200"\w* \w passing|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* thou wast \w trodden|strong="H0947"\w* \w under|strong="H5921"\w* foot \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy own \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*. \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee \w when|strong="H7200"\w* thou wast \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*: \w Live|strong="H2421"\w*: \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee: \w Live|strong="H2421"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w caused|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* bud \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thou didst \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w grow|strong="H6779"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* advancedst, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* camest \w to|strong="H0935"\w* woman’s ornament: thy \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w* were \w fashioned|strong="H3559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w hair|strong="H8181"\w* \w grew|strong="H1431"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thou wast \w naked|strong="H5903"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w full|strong="H3559"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* confusion.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* thy \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w lovers|strong="H1730"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w garment|strong="H3671"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* thy ignominy. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* thee, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thou becamest mine.

\w And|strong="H8081"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* thee \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H8081"\w* cleansed \w away|strong="H7857"\w* thy \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H8081"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* anointed thee \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8336"\w* I \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* thee \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w embroidery|strong="H7553"\w*, \w and|strong="H8336"\w* shed thee \w with|strong="H3847"\w* violet coloured shoes: \w and|strong="H8336"\w* I girded thee about \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, \w and|strong="H8336"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* thee \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w fine|strong="H8336"\w* garments.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* decked thee also \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w ornaments|strong="H5716"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w bracelets|strong="H6781"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w chain|strong="H7242"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w neck|strong="H1627"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* jewel \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thy forehead \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w earrings|strong="H5141"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H8597"\w* \w crown|strong="H5850"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* thou wast adorned \w with|strong="H0398"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* wast clothed \w with|strong="H0398"\w* \w fine|strong="H5560"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w embroidered|strong="H7553"\w* \w work|strong="H7553"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w many|strong="H7553"\w* colours: thou didst \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w fine|strong="H5560"\w* hour, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* wast made \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H3302"\w*: \w and|strong="H3701"\w* wast advanced \w to|strong="H3701"\w* \w be|strong="H3701"\w* \w a|strong="H0398"\w* queen.

\w And|strong="H3318"\w* thy \w renown|strong="H8034"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou wast \w perfect|strong="H3632"\w* \w through|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee, saith \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w trusting|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*, thou playedst \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w renown|strong="H8034"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* thou hast \w prostituted|strong="H2181"\w* thyself \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* passenger, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* thou hast \w made|strong="H6213"\w* thee \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* sewed \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* each side: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* hast \w played|strong="H2181"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* hereafter.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* thou tookest thy \w beautiful|strong="H8597"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* thou madest thee \w images|strong="H6754"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w men|strong="H2145"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* hast \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* fornication \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* thou tookest thy \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* divers colours, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* coveredst \w them|strong="H5414"\w*: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* settest \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* sweet \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* thee, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w fine|strong="H5560"\w* \w flour|strong="H5560"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, wherewith \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w fed|strong="H0398"\w* thee, thou hast \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* sweet odour; \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w done|strong="H1961"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* thou hast \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* thou hast \w borne|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* best \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w same|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w*. \w Is|strong="H0834"\w* thy fornication \w small|strong="H4592"\w*?

Thou hast sacrificed \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, consecrating \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w by|strong="H5414"\w* fire.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* fornications, thou hast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* thy \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* thou wast \w naked|strong="H5903"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w full|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* confusion, \w trodden|strong="H0947"\w* under foot \w in|strong="H3117"\w* thy \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* (\w woe|strong="H0188"\w*, \w woe|strong="H0188"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thee, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*)

\w That|strong="H3605"\w* thou didst \w also|strong="H6213"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* thee \w a|strong="H1129"\w* common stew, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* madest thee \w a|strong="H1129"\w* brothel house \w in|strong="H1129"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w street|strong="H7339"\w*.

\w At|strong="H0413"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* thou hast \w set|strong="H1129"\w* \w up|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H1129"\w* sign \w of|strong="H7218"\w* thy prostitution: \w and|strong="H7218"\w* hast \w made|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w abominable|strong="H8581"\w*: \w and|strong="H7218"\w* hast prostituted thyself \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* hast \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* thy fornications.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* thou hast committed fornication \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* thy neighbours, \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* large \w bodies|strong="H1320"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* hast \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* thy fornications \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w provoke|strong="H3707"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w stretch|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w take|strong="H1639"\w* \w away|strong="H5186"\w* thy justification: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* thee, \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H3637"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* thy \w wicked|strong="H2154"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

Thou hast \w also|strong="H1571"\w* committed fornication \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* Assyrians, \w because|strong="H0413"\w* thou wast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w yet|strong="H1571"\w* \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w after|strong="H0413"\w* thou hadst \w played|strong="H2181"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* thou wast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* contented.

Thou hast \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* thy fornications \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Chanaan \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* wast \w then|strong="H0853"\w* \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*.

Wherein \w shall|strong="H0802"\w* \w I|strong="H0428"\w* cleanse thy \w heart|strong="H3826"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*: seeing thou dost \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H0802"\w* \w a|strong="H4100"\w* shameless \w prostitute|strong="H2181"\w*?

\w Because|strong="H2181"\w* thou hast \w built|strong="H1129"\w* thy brothel house \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* thou hast \w made|strong="H6213"\w* thy \w high|strong="H7413"\w* \w place|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w street|strong="H1870"\w*: \w and|strong="H7218"\w* wast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w by|strong="H1870"\w* disdain enhanceth \w her|strong="H3605"\w* price,

\w But|strong="H0376"\w* \w as|strong="H0376"\w* \w an|strong="H0376"\w* \w adulteress|strong="H5003"\w*, \w that|strong="H0376"\w* bringeth \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* \w over|strong="H0853"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w Gifts|strong="H5083"\w* \w are|strong="H0859"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w harlots|strong="H2181"\w*: \w but|strong="H0859"\w* thou hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* hire \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w lovers|strong="H0157"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thou hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w gifts|strong="H5083"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w side|strong="H5439"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w commit|strong="H5414"\w* fornication \w with|strong="H0413"\w* thee.
